text: Cees van Kooten (; 20 August 1948 â€“ 24 August 2015) was a Dutch former international football striker. After his career he became a football manager, he retired after a heart attack. van Kooten died of esophageal cancer at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from South Holland
title: Cees van Kooten
